persistence-unit.name: simple-contacts
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT READ ACCESS TO Contact contact WHERE contact.owner = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO Contact contact WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)
GRANT READ ACCESS TO User user WHERE user = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO User user WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)

persistence-unit.name: spring-contacts
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO Contact contact WHERE contact.owner.name = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO Contact contact WHERE 'ROLE_ADMIN' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)
GRANT ACCESS TO User user WHERE user.name = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO User user WHERE 'ROLE_ADMIN' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)

persistence-unit.name: annotation-based-field-access
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE bean.name = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)

persistence-unit.name: annotation-based-method-access
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO MethodAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE bean.name = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO MethodAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)

persistence-unit.name: xml-based-field-access
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessXmlTestBean bean WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)

persistence-unit.name: access-check
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT CREATE ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'creator' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)
GRANT READ ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE bean.name = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)

persistence-unit.name: parent-child
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO ParentTestBean bean WHERE bean.name = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO ParentTestBean bean WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)
GRANT ACCESS TO ChildTestBean bean WHERE bean.name = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO ChildTestBean bean WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)

persistence-unit.name: acl-model
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO AbstractAclProtectedEntity bean WHERE (bean.trademarkId is null OR bean.trademarkId = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT entry FROM AclEntry entry JOIN entry.group entry_group WHERE entry.accessControlList = bean.accessControlList AND EXISTS( SELECT user from User user JOIN user.groups user_groups WHERE entry_group = user_groups ) ) OR bean.accessControlList is null )
